title: Designing Strategies for Developing Mathematics Education Materials for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts and general knowledge of educational activities
context.additional_context: Learners primarily access content via smartphones, with optional supplementary print materials. Assessment is designed around summative evaluation

learning_goals: Learners can systematically represent mathematical concepts by applying the four instructional techniques (analogy, imagery, models, propositions)
Learners can design elementary-level mathematics educational materials using various knowledge representation methods
Learners can develop and apply effective instructional strategies in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
